root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 6-3-2, translated into en
root.data: Target 6.3: By 2030, improve water quality, control pollution sources; stop the use of toxic chemicals in industrial, agricultural and aquaculture production that pollute water sources and degrade biodiversity; 100% hazardous wastewater is treated; halve the rate of untreated urban wastewater; promote safe water reuse (global 6.3 target)
